sentences.en: All the firstborn of thy sons thou shalt redeem.
sentences.cn: 凡头生的儿子都要赎出来.

sentences.en: And every firstborn male among your sons you shall redeem.
sentences.cn: 凡你儿子中头生的都要赎出来.

sentences.en: And the sons of Samuel ; the firstborn Vashni, and Abiah.
sentences.cn: 撒母耳的长子是约珥, 次子是亚比亚.

sentences.en: But I have taken the Levites instead of every firstborn among the sons of Israel.
sentences.cn: 民8:18我拣选利未人代替以色列人中一切头生的.

sentences.en: From the Shilonites were Asaiah the firstborn and his sons.
sentences.cn: 代上9:5示罗的子孙中、有长子亚帅雅、和他的众子.

sentences.en: He is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn over all creation.
sentences.cn: 15爱子是那不能看见之神的像, 是首生的,在一切被造的以先.

sentences.en: He smote the firstborn of Egypt , Both of man and beast.
sentences.cn: 诗135:8他将埃及头生的、连人带牲畜、都击杀了.

sentences.en: Here, use my firstborn son as a lawn ornament.
sentences.cn: 在这里, 你可以用我的长子点缀草坪.

sentences.en: Isaac and Rebekah had twin sons, Esau the firstborn and Jacob.
sentences.cn: 以撒和利百加生了一对孪生子, 以扫是头生的,接着的雅各.

sentences.en: Of the Shilonites : Asaiah the firstborn and his sons.
sentences.cn: 5示罗的子孙中、有长子亚帅雅、和他的众子.

sentences.en: The sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel : Maaz , Jamin and Eker.
sentences.cn: 耶拉篾长子兰的儿子是 玛斯, 雅悯,以结.

sentences.en: The sons of Samuel : Joel the firstborn and Abijah the second son.
sentences.cn: 29米拉利的儿子是抹利.抹利的儿子是立尼.立尼的儿子是示每. 示每的儿子是乌撒.

sentences.en: Who is the image of the invisible God, the Firstborn of all creation.
sentences.cn: 爱子是那不能看见之神的像, 是一切受造之物的首生者.

sentences.en: Who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature?
sentences.cn: 这爱子是那看不见的上帝的形象, 是首先的,在一切被造的之上.

words.tran_cn: 首先（主要用于列举条目、论点时）；第一

trans.tran_en: Someone's firstborn is their first child
